system.description:
Fire is the ultimate problem solver, as you have already demonstrated. Now to demonstrate further.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Firebrand, you must have solved at least three problems with fire.

The Firebrand starts with Firestarter.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.firebrand.Item.LRVWEgAZxrFsQBaK]{FIRESTARTER}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.firebrand.Item.GHACZWVsz2RE6mHs]{ANARCHY REIGNS}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.firebrand.Item.1YVQeHFyrWbmFJeg]{BURNING SOUL}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.firebrand.Item.TkbQUkJC0E0LG6Xm]{DRAGONFIRE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.firebrand.Item.Qbf35izm2xNiwtA8]{PLAY WITH FIRE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.firebrand.Item.BQtnujhBMBy5mit8]{PYROMANIA}

advancements.name: Increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
You become immune to fire, and cannot take damage from fire, heat, or explosions.
